Homura Akemi is the only person in the world who remembers the existence of Madoka Kaname, the innocent young girl who gave up everything to make the world a better place for all Magical Girls. However, that isn't going to stop her from attempting to spread the word of her sacrifice.
+2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from Monuments. +10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from Population in all Cities.
She's the reason you wake up in the morning and the reason you continue to fight, and she has appreciated your efforts tremendously. Remember, everything is for her sake!
You are by far the most important person in her life, and she will do anything to keep you safe and happy.
Your single-minded obsession with Madoka and subsequent callous treatment of everyone else has caused them to view you with scorn.
